14.2.3 Zinc
Zinc is a component of many proteins involved in normal metabolic functions and cellular replication, and 
plays a key role in the development of most tissues [36], especially in the central nervous system [37]. 
Moderate maternal zinc deficiency may influence fetal development through reduced cell proliferation and
